item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 5, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Markets tumble as China announces 34% retaliatory tariffs on US imports
2. [Opinion] America’s astonishing act of self-harm
3. US stocks shed $5.4tn in two days as Trump’s tariffs stoke recession fears
4. [Opinion] How to make sense of Donald Trump’s tariffs
5. Cruz says Republicans face midterms ‘bloodbath’ if tariffs trigger recession
